column2:
On  the  accused-appellant.  We 
impose  07  years  Rigorous
Imprisonment instead of 10 years Rigorous Imprisonment.
All  the  other conditions  namely,  Rs.10,000/=  fine  in  default

06  months 
imprisonment  will 
remain  as 
it 
is. 
Further

Rs.100,000/= compensation 
to be paid to the victim child in

default  of 
12  months  Rigorous 
Imprisonment  will 
also

remain as it is. 
The  7  years  Rigorous  Imprisonment will  be

implemented  from 
the  date  of  conviction. 
We  direct 
the
Prison  Authorities  to  implement  the  sentence  from  the  date
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
